title: Bug 16974Export on packages view don't care with the select items
description: Bug 16974Export on packages view don't care with the select items
SR: Build 20020521Tested on Linux/Motif and W2K1) Select some Items in the Packages view2) In popup menu choice the option "Export..."3) In the first page of the export dialog choice "File System"4) The selects items to be export are not the same items that was select on thestep 1 in the packages view.The bug do not happens in the Nagivator view and do not happens when on thestep 3 you select the option "Jar File".
